name: web-hapi
description: example hapi.js REST server for addresses

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run boot-up-database" "node -e 'setTimeout(function() {}, 2500);' && node api/server.js" --kill-others --success all
scripts.boot-up-database: npm run shut-down-database; rm -rf ./db || true; [ -d ./db ] || mkdir -p -m 777 ./db; [ -d ./db/data ] || mkdir -m 777 ./db/data; mongod --config ./mongod.conf

author: tom pepe
